content: a mobius is basically a circle with one twist in the foundation row or first round it becomes a figure 8 that allows us to work the top side and the bottom side of the circle at the same time this pattern is written for the mobius cowl but it includes additional notes how to easily increase the size of your project to a shrug or shawl you can use any type or thickness of yarn to achieve something light and lacy or extra warm and cozy
